oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Classification theorems for hermitian forms, the Rost kernel and Hasse principle over fields with cd(2)(k) <= 3
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: PREETI, R
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Algebras with involution
Galois cohomology of classical groups
Hasse principle
CLASSICAL-GROUPS
GALOIS COHOMOLOGY
INVARIANT
CURVES
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this paper we prove classification theorems for hermitian forms over some central simple algebras with involution over a field k with cd(2)(k) <= 3. We apply these results to show the triviality of the kernel of the Rost invariant for the classical algebraic groups associated to such hermitian forms over k. We also deduce a Hasse principle for algebraic groups defined over function fields of curves over p-adic fields thus proving a conjecture due to Colliot-Thelene-Parimala-Suresh for a large class of groups.
